Package stars

Interface FlatFileObject

All Known Implementing Classes:
Course, Index_details, IndexClass, Student_details, User_details
public interface FlatFileObject
An interface implemented by objects that can be written to and read from files in flat file format.
Since:
2020/11/14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lai Minghui

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String delimiter
    The delimter that separate columns in the flat file
    static java.lang.String EmptyString
    String that represents a non-value or empty column in flat file format.
    static java.lang.String regexDelimiter
    Regex version of delimiter used in flat file format.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String buildFlatFileString​(java.lang.Object... args)
    Combines string representations of objects passed into the method into a flat file string that can be written to a flat file.
    static java.lang.String collectionToFlatFileString​(java.util.Collection list)
    Helper method to convert a list into a column of a line in flat file format.
    static void flatFileStringToCollection​(java.lang.String str, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> collection)
    Helper method to covert list f strings in flat fileformat to a a collection of strings
    boolean fromFlatFileString​(java.lang.String s)
    Initializes this object using a line read from a flat file.
    java.lang.String getDatabaseId()
    Gets the id of this flat file object used to index it in a flat file database
    java.lang.String toFlatFileString()
    Returns the flat file string representation of the object.

  • Method Details

    • toFlatFileString

      java.lang.String toFlatFileString()
      Returns the flat file string representation of the object.
      Returns:
      Returns the flat file representation of the object.

    • fromFlatFileString

      boolean fromFlatFileString​(java.lang.String s)
      Initializes this object using a line read from a flat file.
      Parameters:
      s - A line from a flat file
      Returns:
      True if the initialization is successful, false otherwise.

    • getDatabaseId

      java.lang.String getDatabaseId()
      Gets the id of this flat file object used to index it in a flat file database
      Returns:
      The id of the flat file object

    • buildFlatFileString

      static java.lang.String buildFlatFileString​(java.lang.Object... args)
      Combines string representations of objects passed into the method into a flat file string that can be written to a flat file.
      Parameters:
      args - A series of objects to be written into a flat file string
      Returns:
      A flat file string where each column is the string representation of the objects in args, in the order that they are passed in.

    • collectionToFlatFileString

      static java.lang.String collectionToFlatFileString​(java.util.Collection list)
      Helper method to convert a list into a column of a line in flat file format.
      Parameters:
      list - A collection to convert to flat file format
      Returns:
      A flat file representation of the specified collection.

    • flatFileStringToCollection

      static void flatFileStringToCollection​(java.lang.String str, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> collection)
      Helper method to covert list f strings in flat fileformat to a a collection of strings
      Parameters:
      str - The flat file string containing a list of strings to be processed
      collection - An object implementing collection that will store the strings extracted from the flat file string.
